name: objectiv-google-maps
description: Create searchable Google Maps for specific post types.

scripts.build-js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] assets/js/src/main.js -o assets/js/build/main.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] assets/js/src/main.js -o assets/js/build/main.js
